column1: # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Before leaving my house , I check the bus schedule on the internet .
#id=2
#text=I noticed the bus was running late today , but I went outside to wait at the bus stop anyway .
#id=3
#text=The bus actually arrived even later than it was estimated on the internet .
#id=4
#text=I got onto the bus after the arriving passengers exited .
#id=5
#text=I paid with exact change into the money collector .
#id=6
#text=There were no empty seats on the bus and almost all the places to stand were full too .
#id=7
#text=I found a spot next to a man who smelled like he was eating onions .
#id=8
#text=For the next 22 blocks I had to smell him before he exited the bus .
#id=9
#text=The next person who stood by me was a morbidly obese man who liked to talk about anything he could think of .
#text=I tried to just look out the window because it was so uncomfortable .
#text=Finally , seven blocks later I was at my stop and I could not have been more relieved .
